animeDescription: Aki Miyagawa moved to Tokyo to pursue her dream to be a taiko drummer, but had a hard time balancing her strict training regimen with her part-time job. Now, after 15 years, she's returning to coach others for a taiko festival.  (Source: ANN)  Project by J.C.Staff announced to be part of Anime Mirai 2015.
animeStaff: [['Suzuki Youhei', ['Director']], ['Iwanami Yoshikazu', ['Sound Director']], ['Ishida Miyuki', ['Episode Director', 'Storyboard']], ['Yaegashi Youhei', ['Animation Director', 'Character Design']]]
